name: Witch's Garden (College Project)
description:
Witch's Garden is a game initially made as a college assignment, but also purely made for tests for a future bigger project. Just a simple shooting & towor defense tower type game.

You play as a small red headed witch called "Amy", she adores her garden and grows her crops with her magic powers. One day, the creepy crawlers from the forbidden forest bust through her gate to consume and destroy her crops. Now she must use her magic wand to cast her spells against these creatures and eliminate them!!

Protect the garden!!!
